abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-15}}|{{Ability|[[Death Hit]]|34-59|element=death}}|{{Ability|Drowning Wave|makes you drown|element=drowning}}|{{Ability|Great Intoxicating Ball on itself|makes you [[Drunkenness|drunk]]|element=drunk}}|{{Ability|[[Invisibility]]|element=invisible}}|{{Ability|Explosion Exori|5-7|element=manadrain}}|{{Ability|Red Sparkles on itself|[[Haste]]?|element=haste}}|{{Ability|Frequent [[Self-Healing]]|element=healing}} }}
sounds: Oh my, you forgot to put your pants on!
Dream a little dream with me!
name: Phantasm (Weak)
location: In the beginning of the [[Pits of Inferno|Caves of Inferno]], just after the [[Pile of Bones]] with small rewards. It is also summoned by [[Phantasm]].
strategy: It is recommended to shoot [[Great Fireball Rune|GFBs]] to kill the summons, else you might get yourself trapped very easily, as [[Phantasm]]s usually spawn in bigger groups.
